meanings.sent1: He birded a robin for his collection.

meanings.sent4: The photographer birded the majestic eagle in flight.
meanings.sent5: The hunter birded quails in the forest.

meanings.sent1: They birded the colorful parrots in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: I birded a rare species of bird in the park.

meanings.definition: Having a particular type of bird.
meanings.sent1: The birded cage housed a canary.
meanings.sent2: The garden had a birded feeder attracting finches.
meanings.sent3: The birded aviary displayed exotic birds.
meanings.sent4: The birded tree was filled with chirping sparrows.
meanings.sent5: The birded nest was home to a family of robins.
